text: 6. Determine whether the Mersenne numbers M7 is a prime. You are given that M7 = 131071 and (363)? > 131071, and the primes less than 363 are 103, 137, 239 and 307. Use the Lucas-Lehmer test to show that My is a prime. You are given that the integer r5 = 111 modulo 127 is 111. You may use a calculator but should show your work. (4pts)
